attributes.action: Complete a full national inquiry into the mostly Pakistani rape gangs.
attributes.additional_details: To complete a full in depth national enquiry that brings the criminals as well as those in power that facilitated it to justice. Also to record and release the data in regards to the criminals ethnic origin. In the case of foreign or dual national they should be deported. Their article 8 rights shouldn’t reign supreme over a victims article 3 or article 5 rights.
attributes.background: To commit to and perform a full and in depth rape gang national enquiry. That not only leads to prosecutions of those that committed the acts themselves but also those in power that allowed it to happen by prosecuting them for misconduct in public office.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
